info.+content: Lucy is a 17-year-old girl, who wants to join a mage guild to become a full-fledged mage. One day when visiting Harujion Town, she meets Natsu (and his talking cat Happy), a young man who is looking for the salamander and who helps her get out of a sticky situation. That’s when she find out that Natsu not only is a mage, but is also a member of one of the world’s most infamous mage guilds: Fairy Tail.
Fairy Tail @ Maga Mega (Shonen Magazine Online)

review.+content: Fairy Tail Manga Omnibus Volume 1 Review
